pages.text: You remember the blocks that shielded your precious minerals from external influences? Those black and white materials look really pretty, so you designed some decoration blocks from their materials.$(br2)Maybe they also absorbed some of the magical properties of the minerals themselves? Who knows.
When melted, the bright color of calcite comes out even more. Smelting Smooth Basalt also results in a much cleaner texture, which is perfect for building.
The dark gray basalt surrounding the geodes is a wonderful contrast to the bright hues of the calcite.$(br)When smelted, it almost gets black.
The bright white of calcite may be the brightest natural material you've stumbled across. It looks so handsome, clean and radiates dignity.
While you were searching for geodes underground, you also stumbled across tuff. After you've collected a whole bunch of it, it can't hurt to make some additional shapes out of this material, too
